resources.string:
"Apple Juice is not only detoxifying but also good for lowering cholesterol, aiding digestion, and helping your skin.
The benefits of apples come from their vitamins, minerals, enzymes, malic acid, and fiber.
1 Wash the ingredients well. 2 Remove the stems and cut the apples as needed to fit the chute. 3 Juice carrots in the Kuvings Whole Slow Juicer."
